item.title: Bootloader checker
item.author: Vimal A.R
item.description: A bash code snippet that helps to check if the installed bootloader is Grub or LILO. [code language=“bash”] #!/bin/bash A=`mount | awk ‘{print $1}’ | grep -n /dev/ | grep “1:” | cut -f2 -d “:” | cut -c 1-8` B=`mount | awk ‘{print $1}’ | grep -n /dev/ | grep “1:” | cut -f2 -d “:”` echo ; echo -e " / mounted on $B \n"; dd if=$A bs=512 count=1 2>&1 | grep GRUB > /dev/null; if [ $?
